title: Detect Pedestrian Jaywalking Hotspot
description: An analyst reviews camera footage to identify locations where pedestrians frequently cross the street unsafely, suggesting the need for a new crosswalk.

tasks.description: Use camera analytics to scan for 'mid-block crossing' events along a major road over the past month.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of locations with frequent jaywalking events.

tasks.description: Identify one specific location with a particularly high number of unsafe crossings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pinpoints a hotspot for unsafe pedestrian behavior.

tasks.description: Create a report for the transportation department recommending a study for a new marked crosswalk at that location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a data-driven recommendation to improve pedestrian safety.
